product_name: Hi-Tec Total Terrain Aero Waterproof Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Weekend warriors love the men's Hi-Tec Total Terrain Aero Waterproof Shoes. They feature a suede and mesh upper with a ventilated mesh panel for breathable comfort on mountain trails. Suede and ventilated mesh uppers deliver a reliable blend of waterproofness and good breathability for hiking in any weather. The nylon shank lends support, while the compression-molded EVA midsole absorbs shock and provides cushioning. Carbon rubber outsole on the Hi-Tec Total Terrain Aero Waterproof Shoes delivers reliable traction on varied terrain. Ghillie and double-eyelet lacing system provides a secure fit. Closeout.
short_description: Weekend warriors love the men's Hi-Tec Total Terrain Aero Waterproof Shoes. They feature a suede and mesh upper with a ventilated mesh panel for breathable comfort on mountain trails.
